title: b._jenet
body:
[[Fatal Fury]] character, also known as [b]B. Jenet[/b] for short. Her real name is [b]Jenet Behrn[/b] (ジェニー・バーン), and she is the leader of the Lillien Knights, a pirate crew that travels the world. Jenet led a life of luxury before leaving to become a pirate.

She made her debut in [[Garou: Mark of the Wolves]] as a newcomer, makes a returning appearance in [[Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves]], and made several appearances in [[The King of Fighters]] series.

She is an English pirate with [[long hair|long]], [[blonde hair]] and [[blue eyes]], wearing a purple halterneck with a white [[Jolly Roger]] on the leg of the dress. She wears purple [[high heels]] to go with her dress and a [[thong]] underneath. 

She fights using a [[martial arts]] style she calls LK Arts (Lillien Knight Arts), which is a combination of various martial arts and primarily based on savate (French kickboxing).

h4. External links

* "SNK Wiki: B. Jenet":[https://snk.fandom.com/wiki/B._Jenet]

title: tom_chin_cheng_hanji_(meme)
body:
A [[meme]] originated from a segment of [[Tom and Jerry]] from the 1940s.

The original scene shows [[tom (tom and jerry)|Tom the Cat]] being squashed by a vinyl [[record]] and transformed into a [[racism|stereotypical]] depiction of [[China|Chinese]] people (sharp eyes, large belly, and with a [[fu manchu (mustache)|]] mustache) while spinning on the [[phonograph]].

* !asset #25420683: Original scene (click to view the animation).

The meme is usually accompanied with the song ""If You Feel My Love (Chaow MIX)":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uMEU2Jpj0Y4]", specifically the segment with a sample of Beijing Opera "Chen Shimei and Qin Xianglian".

title: tizoc_(snk)
body:
[b]Tizoc[/b], otherwise known as [b]Griffon Mask[/b] or [b]The Griffon[/b] in the Japanese version, is a character from both the [[Fatal Fury]] and [[The King of Fighters]] series. He started out in the Fatal Fury game, [[Garou: Mark of the Wolves]]. He replaced [[Raiden (snk)|]] for the [[The King of Fighters 2003]] lineup. 

Tizoc is a heroic Mexican "luchador" [i](wrestler)[/i], and hails from [[Mexico]]. Definitely [i]not[/i] [[King of Dinosaurs]].

He is voiced by Hanada Hikaru.

title: ash_ketchum
body:
[b]JP[/b]: [code]サトシ[/code] ([i]Satoshi[/i])
[b]EN[/b]: Ash Ketchum

[i]Pikachu, I choose you![/i]

Lead character in the [i][[pokemon|Pokémon]][/i] anime from 1997 to 2023, based on [[Red (pokemon)|]], the player character in the [[pokemon rgby|first Pokémon games]]. Ash is a Pokémon Trainer who, over the course of 1,200+ weekly episodes, took on the challenge of each region that was depicted in the most recent main games at the time, as well as thwarting the evil scheme of the [[Team Rocket]].  He has had a number of travel partners and recurring rivals.

His signature Pokémon is [[Pikachu]], in which he chose not to evolve it due to him preferring its current appearance over [[Raichu]].

His name in Japanese is a reference to the Pokémon creator, Tajiri Satoshi.

h4. Official art

* !post #7364752: [[Pokemon Journeys]]

h4. Variations
[expand]
h5. Series variations

* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_(classic_anime)}}
** He wears a blue and white [[jacket]] with [[wing collar]] and gold trim worn open over a black [[t-shirt]] with [[jeans]], [[sneakers]], green [[fingerless gloves]], and his white and red [[baseball cap]] with a green "L" on the front.
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_rse_(anime)}}
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_dppt_(anime)}}
** He wears this outfit: post #1179562, post #659965
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_bw_(anime)}}
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_xy_(anime)}}
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_sm_(anime)}}
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_journeys}}
** He wears a blue, sleeveless [[vest]] over a white [[shirt]] with a red stripe on the front, as well as [[two-toned]] [[shorts]] (blue on the front, dark blue on the back). His new baseball cap is mostly red, with a white brim and a black [[pokedex|Pokédex]] symbol on the front. He also sometimes carries a green [[backpack]].

h5. Cross-dressing versions

* [[ashley (pokemon)|]]
** Ash [[crossdressing]] as a [[blonde hair|blonde]] girl wearing an [[orange dress]].
* {{ash_ketchum enmaided}}
** Ash [[crossdressing]] by wearing a [[maid]] costume.
* [[ashley (pokemon bw098)]]
** Ash [[crossdressing]] as a [[pink hair|pink-haired]] girl wearing a [[blue dress]].

h5. Other
* {{ash_ketchum pokemon_journeys winter_clothes}}
** A variation on his usual clothes worn when traveling to Sinnoh. The only modification is that instead of a vest, he wears a long-sleeved blue winter jacket, which he doesn't bother to close.

See also [[ash ketchum (cosplay)]] for other people dressed as Ash.
[/expand]

h4. Ash's Pokémon

[expand]
h6. Joined in [[pokemon (classic anime)|the original series (Kanto/Orange Islands)]]

* ([[Pichu]] →) [[Pikachu]] ↔ [[Gigantamax Pikachu]]
* [[Caterpie]] → [[Metapod]] → [[Butterfree]]
* [[Pidgeotto]] → [[Pidgeot]]

title: elvis_presley
body:
[b]Elvis Aaron Presley[/b] (January 8, 1935 – August 16, 1977), known simply as [b]Elvis[/b], was a famous [[united states|American]] singer. Considered by many musicians and musical historians as the most important and influential solo artist of the 20th century.

Nicknamed "the King of Rock 'n Roll". Until 2008, he held the record for most number one songs by a solo artist with seventeen, which includes the hits "Jailhouse Rock", "Hound Dog" and "Don't Be Cruel". His likeness, particularly his [[pompadour]] hairstyle, has ingrained into popular culture around the world. 

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elvis_Presley]
other_names: エルヴィス・プレスリー

title: pompadour
body:
A hair style in which the front hair is swept up from the forehead into a high roll at the top of the head. Often exaggerated in animation to comical proportions. Popular with rockers (particularly [[Elvis Presley|Elvis]] impersonator), gang members, and other rebels.

The Japanese often misunderstand the pompadour as the "リーゼント (regent style)."

h4. Characters/people with this hair style

* [[Bulat]] from [[Akame ga Kill!]]

title: lilly_kane
body:
A minor character in [[Fatal Fury]], Lilly is [[Billy Kane]]'s sweet and innocent little sister. [[Joe Higashi]] wants to date her, much to her elder brother's intense disapproval.

Although normally a non-playable character, she makes a rare playable appearance in [[The King of Fighters]]: Maximum Impact 2.

In this costume, she wears a [[checkered kimono|checkered]] [[green kimono]] with a [[red sash]] and [[long sleeves|long]] [[green sleeves]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] in this costume, it's the same as her [[cecilia immergreen (1st costume)|default hairstyle]], except it's done in a [[two side up]] and held with [[green flower|green]] [[hair flower]]s and [[red bow|red]] [[hair bow]]s.

title: race_limitation_(lingerie)
body:
Lingerie made by Parfaite that features [[lace]], [[frills]], and [[garter straps]]. The original race limitation uses [[lace-trimmed thighhighs]]. Race Limitation/Maiden is [[maid]]-themed and features white frills and [[frilled thighhighs]].

The lingerie was successfully funded on the crowdfunding platform CAMPFIRE and can be found "here":[https://camp-fire.jp/projects/view/4257].

title: mayu_(vocaloid)
body:
MAYU is a Japanese [[VOCALOID]] developed and distributed by EXIT TUNES, and was released for the VOCALOID3 engine. 

Her appearance was illustrated by [[hidari (left side)|Hidari]] and she was designed to be a [[yandere]]. Her hair is light [[blonde hair|blonde]] with [[multicolored hair|multicolored]] tones. Her eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]].  She wears a black [[lolita fashion|lolita]] dress with [[piano print]], [[frilled socks]] with matching [[elbow gloves]], and [[black shoes]]. 

She wears a [[hair ornament]] and carries around a [[stuffed rabbit]] named [[Usano Mimi]] and an [[axe]] weapon.

h4. External links

* Official Website: http://mayusan.jp

title: frederica_bernkastel
body:
The [[Witch]] of Miracles. She can create a miracle in any situation as long as its probability is not equal to zero.

She has [[purple eyes|purple]] [[empty eyes]], [[small breasts]], and [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]] stylized in a [[hime cut]] with [[blunt bangs]] & [[sidelocks]]. She wears a [[frilled dress|frilled]] [[layered dress|layered]] [[black dress]] with [[wide sleeves|wide]] [[puffy sleeves|puffy]] [[frilled sleeves]], a [[blue bow|blue]] [[dress bow]], [[frilled socks|frilled]] [[white socks|white]] [[kneehighs]], and [[black shoes|black]] [[mary janes]]. She also has a [[black tail|black]] [[cat tail]] with a [[tail bow]].

h4. See also

* [[Furude Rika]]
* [[Frederica Bernkastel (cat)]]

title: crystal_boy
body:
Character in [[Space Adventure Cobra]]. [[Cobra (space adventure cobra)|]]'s archenemy, Crystal Boy is a high-ranking member of the Pirate Guild, a malevolent organization spanning much of space. Crystal Boy is a humanoid cyborg with a body made of a special indestructible glass-like substance. His golden "skeleton" can be seen through his glass body.

Possesses a distinctive golden crescent-shaped claw that attaches to his right hand. The claw can be fired off as a grappling hook or projectile weapon.

He is voiced by [[Kobayashi Kiyoshi]].

body:

Her casual outfit is based on the [[virgin killer outfit]] and consists of a dark [[blue hat|blue]] [[beret]] with a star decoration, long-sleeved [[frilled shirt|frilled]] [[white shirt]] with a [[frilled shirt collar]] and [[center frills]] a [[red bowtie]], a [[pink sweater|pink]] [[aran sweater]], a [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[blue skirt|dark blue]] [[plaid skirt|plaid]] [[high-waist skirt]] a [[black pantyhose]] and [[red shoes|red]] [[mary janes]]. Additionally, this outfit was intentionally designed by [[Shigure Ui (VTuber)|"Ui-mama"]] to match with [[shigure ui (vtuber) (casual)|her own new outfit]] which was revealed a day later.

She has 3 different [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyles]] in this costume:

The 4th/New Years [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Oozora Subaru]]. 

Her New Year's outfit consists of a [[print kimono]] with an [[uroko (pattern)|]] pattern, a [[blue capelet|blue]] [[lace-trimmed capelet]], a [[high-waist skirt|high-waist]] [[blue hakama|blue]] [[hakama skirt]] and [[brown boots|brown]] [[lace-up boots]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]], it's the same as her [[oozora subaru (1st costume)|default costume]], but decorated with a [[white bow|white]] and [[red bow|red]] [[hair bow]]s and 2 [[hair flower]]s.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3869005: Profile
* !post #3735166: Reference sheet

title: oozora_subaru_(work)
body:
The 2nd [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Oozora Subaru]].

Her second costume consists of a [[grey hat|grey]] [[sailor hat]] a [[blue jacket|blue]] [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[cropped jacket]] with [[sleeve cuffs]], an [[armband]] and golden [[buttons]], a [[high collar|high-collared]] [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[grey shirt|grey]] [[sleeveless shirt]] with a [[vertical-striped shirt|vertical]] [[pinstripe shirt|pinstripe]] pattern, a [[black bowtie]] with a golden [[star (symbol)|]], [[blue shorts]] with [[suspenders]] and a [[large bow|large]] [[back bow]] and [[hip vent]]s [[panty peek|showing the waistband]] of her [[lace-trimmed panties|lace-trimmed]] [[black panties]], [[grey thighhighs]], and [[black boots|black]] [[high heel boots]]. As this is the costume that Subaru uses for her "Oozora Police department" stream, it is also often drawn with a [[police hat]] instead of her sailor hat.

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this costume is [[short hair]] with [[swept bangs]] and a [[side braid]] held with a golden [[star hair ornament|star]] [[hairclip]].

h4. Appearance

title: mr._scarletella
body:
One of [[Homicipher]]'s main love interests.
A man with a [[red umbrella]] who's obsessed with the player.

title: hyrule_warriors:_age_of_imprisonment
body: Upcoming third installment in the [[Hyrule Warriors]] series. Similarly to [[Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity|its predecessor]], it is a prequel to [[The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom]], focusing on [[Princess Zelda]]'s trip back in time during that game.

title: sin_sack
body:
The [b]Sin Sack[/b] is a [[faceless male]] mob character originated from [[Touhou]] fandom. They wears a [[sack]] over their head marked with the character 罪 ([i]Tsumi[/i], or "Sin"). As a result, they are referred to as 罪袋/[i]Tsumi-fukuro[/i], which literally means "sin bag" or "sin sack".

They are frequently depicted as a [[pervert]]ed followers of various female characters. In recent times, they are most commonly seen on various NSFW [[mikumikudance|MMD]] videos (particularily those from the [[Iwara.tv]] website), where they are used as a generic male mob characters.

title: iwara.tv
body:
[b]Iwara.tv[/b] is a Japanese video hosting site. Originally dedicated to [[MMD]] videos, Iwara later covered various other [[3D]] animation mediums, such as [[Blender (medium)|]], [[Koikatsu (medium)|]], [[Source Filmmaker (medium)|]], etc..

The NSFW version of the site (ecchi.iwara.tv) in particular has become popular and (in)famous in its own right due to its own distinct culture, particularly the usage of [[Sin Sack]] as the stock "stud" character in the videos.

title: cattleya_(shiny_colors)
body: Cattleya (カトレア Katorea) is [[Arisugawa Natsuha]]'s [[pet]] [[dog]]. She is a female [[Golden Retriever]].

title: kobun_(idolmaster)
body: Kobun (こぶん lit. Henchman) is a stray brown [[tabby cat]] that was found by [[Ogami Tamaki]]. It lives in the 765Pro Live Theater.

title: zondo_gei
body:
A fictional manned giant robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse. It first appeared in [[Crossbone Gundam]].

[b]XM-08 Zondo Gei[/b]

A very small (10 meters/32 feet high) but heavy armed and armored mass produced combat [[mobile_suit|MS]] deployed by the late [[Crossbone Vanguard]] for piracy operations.

It is armed with a [[shot lancer]], a [[beam rifle]], a large [[beam shield]] emitter in its left shoulder and an anti-beam tunic.

title: shot_lancer
body:
A fictional giant robot weapon from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse. It first appeared in [[Gundam F91]]. 

The [b]Shot Lancer[/b] is basically the [[fusion]] of a rocket [[lance]] launcher and a dual (or tetra) cannon [[machine gun]]. It was designed by the [[Crossbone Vanguard]] mechanized forces to limit the collateral damage to the space colonies during [[mobile suit]] battles.

title: border_collie
body:
A breed of [[dog]] originating from the Anglo-Saxon region, and widely used as herding dogs (AKA sheepdogs) or for sport. They have a strong medium-sized build and moderately thick fur colored black, white and brown.

[[Enekk]] from [[Spice and Wolf]] is a sheepdog that greatly resembles a Border Collie.

h4.See also

* [[Tag Group:Dogs]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Border Collie":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Border_Collie

title: thundergun_(blue_archive)
body:
Combat [[sentry|Sentry gun]] of [[Utaha (blue archive)|]] from [[Blue Archive]]. It uses two [[Gatling gun|Gatling guns]] as armament.

It is currently Sentient and can actually speak, unlike mass produced ones from the Kaiser Corporation, can use its treads for travelling or following Utaha or stay stationary.

body: Junior is [[Hakozaki Serika]]'s [[pet]] [[dog]]. He is a male [[Border Collie]] and is usually depicted wearing a [[red bandana]] [[bandana around neck|around his neck]].

body: Mamemaru is [[Komiya Kaho]]'s [[pet]] [[dog]]. He is a male [[Shiba Inu]].

title: baldr_(fire_emblem_heroes)
body:
Character in [[Fire Emblem Heroes]], introduced in Book IX.

A goddess from Asgardr, Baldr is an arrogant, haughty goddess sent by her master, [[Alfathor (Fire Emblem)|Alfathor]] to apprehend [[Alfonse (Fire Emblem)|]] for accused crimes against the gods.

Not to be confused with [[Baldr (Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War)|the crusader]] from [[Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War]].

title: the_legend_of_zelda
body:
[b]The Legend of Zelda[/b] (ゼルダの伝説, [i]Zelda no Densetsu[/i]) is a high fantasy action-adventure video game series developed and published by [[Nintendo]] and created by the famous game designer [[Miyamoto Shigeru|Shigeru Miyamoto]].

The gameplay consists of a mixture of action, adventure, puzzle solving, role-playing, and occasional platforming, stealth, and racing elements. The series centers around [[Link]], the sole playable character and hero, and is usually set in the land of Hyrule. Link is often given the task of rescuing [[Princess Zelda]] from [[Ganondorf]], the primary villain of the series.

The story commonly involves a relic known as the [[Triforce]], a set of three golden triangles of omnipotence. The hero in each game is not always the same iteration of Link, although the same character sometimes appears across multiple games.

title: bremerton_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Azur Lane]]'s personification of the US Navy heavy cruiser USS [i]Bremerton[/i] (CA-130). Character design by [[Katsudansou]].

She has [[pink eyes]] and [[pink hair]] with [[grey hair|grey]] [[streaked hair]], tied in [[twintails]] with [[hair intakes]]. Other minor details include a [[mole under eye|mole under her right eye]] and [[mole on breast|right breast]]. Her most notable features, however, are her very [[large breasts]], and [[ear piercing|ear]] and [[navel piercing]]s. This, combined with her overall design, caused her to be associated with [[gyaru]] stereotypes.

Her outfit consists of a [[crop top]] (usually depicted as [[crop top overhang]]) and [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]] worn over a [[pink bikini|pink]] [[bikini]], a [[lifebuoy ornament|lifebuoy]]-shaped [[black choker]], black [[thighhighs]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[ankle boots]]. Her "combat outfit" also features an [[blue coat|indigo coat]] bearing her designation and a [[red-tinted eyewear|red]] [[aviator sunglasses]].

h4. Skins

title: shiranui_flare
body:
A [[Virtual YouTuber|VTuber]] and member of [[hololive]]'s 3rd generation hololive Fantasy.

She is a [[dark-skinned female|dark-skinned]] [[elf]] with [[pointy ears]], [[long hair|long]], [[streaked hair|streaked]] [[blonde hair]], often kept in a [[high ponytail]] held with a [[hair bow]] and [[sidelocks]]. She also has [[large breasts]] that while she downplays them with most of her costumes, are actually larger than [[Houshou Marine|Marine]]'s.

Designed by [[lack]] and rigged by [[Tou Ilie]].

title: sanji_(one_piece)
body:
[[One Piece]] character. Full name Vinsmoke Sanji. The cook of the [[Straw Hat Pirates]]. His goal is to find the All Blue, the legendary sea where the four great seas of the world meet.

A skilled kick-based martial artist with a perverted side that manifests in episodes of exaggerated [[nosebleed]]s at the sight of a beautiful woman. Has [[curly eyebrows]]. He specializes in using coordinated kicks as his main fighting style, better known as "Black Leg Style".

He is the main character of the spin-off culinary manga [[Shokugeki no Sanji]].

title: hiyori_sou
body:
A character in [[Kimi Ga Shine]].

He has [[aqua eyes]], [[short hair|short]] [[aqua hair]] and [[white skin|white]] or [[pale skin]].

He typically wears a [[green headwear|green]] [[beanie]], a [[red scarf|red]] [[polka dot scarf|polka dot]] [[scarf]] with a [[fringe trim]], a [[blue jacket|blue]] or [[purple jacket|purple]] [[jacket]] with [[long sleeves]], a [[yellow shirt]], [[brown pants]] with a [[belt]] and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]]. He also has a [[key necklace]], though it is typically hidden under his scarf.

[spoilers]His real name is Tsukimi Shin. The name he uses as an alias in the death game originally belonged to [[Midori (kimi ga shine)|]].[/spoilers]

title: ipn
body:
Professional [[Apex Legends]] player and currently an independent streamer. Formerly a member of [[Alliance (team)|]], he left the team on March 3, 2022. Later worked for [[00 Nation]] before departing on July 21, 2023. 

Usually portrayed as a [[shrimp]]. He later received an avatar character illustrated by [[papercider]]. Debuted as a [[Virtual Youtuber]] on June 15, 2024.

title: manaia_matawhaura_hato
body:
Character from [[Luminous Witches]]. Nicknamed "Mana".

A sergeant from the New Zealand Air Force. She's a genki girl who can never seem to stand still, but has trouble flying due to the unsuitability of her familiar, a kiwi named [[Kyuu-chan (luminous witches)|]].

She's based on Maori singer Ana Matawhāura Hato.

title: traditional_halo
body:
The round circular ring often associated with depictions of [[angel]]s.

Traditional [[halo]]s should be simple solid rings, with no protrusions or extra details. Damaged or broken halos still count if they adhere to these standards. [b] Do not [/b] tag [[fake_halo|fake]] or [[mechanical_halo|mechanical]] halos.

For when the halo is also glowing see [[glowing_halo]] which may or may not also be a traditional halo.

title: hinoshita_kaho_(winter_casual)
body:
The [[casual]] winter [[official alternate costume|outfit]] worn by [[Hinoshita Kaho]] in [[Link! Like! Love Live!]].

The innerwear consists of a [[red sweater|reddish]]-[[pink sweater|pink]] [[turtleneck sweater]] and a [[brown skirt|brown]] [[plaid skirt|plaid]] [[miniskirt]].

The outerwear is composed of a [[white jacket|white]] [[fur-trimmed jacket]] with [[three-quarter sleeves]], giving the effect of [[layered sleeves]], and a [[white hat|white]] [[pom pom beanie]].

Accessories include a [[heart necklace]] and [[hair bobbles]] instead of the usual rabbit hair ornaments.
